Name: Numeric Continuous
Description: Any value that can be expressed as a float

Name: Numeric Discrete
Description: Any value that can be expressed as a integer

Name: Categorical Binary
Description: Any value that can be either true or false

Name: Categorical Ordinal
Description: Any value from an ordered enumeration

Name: Data Frame
Description: "Data that could be stored in a spreadsheet table

Name: Predictor
Description: A column in the spreadsheet that can be used for prediction (statistics)

Name: Dependent Variable
Description: A column that may be able to be predicted (statistics)

Name: Feature
Description: A column in the spreadsheet that can be used for prediction (data science)

Name: Outcome
Description: "A column that may be able to be predicted

Name: Record
Description: A row in the spreadsheet

Name: Sample
Description: "A collection of rows (statistics)

Name: Nonrectangular Data Structures
Description: "Time Series or Spatial data structures Graph (or network) data structures"

Name: Graph
Description: Plots and visualizations (statistics)

Name: Trimmed mean
Description: Average without the extreme values.

Name: Robust
Description: Not impacted by extreme values.

Name: Outlier
Description: A value that is quite different from the rest of values

Name: Anomaly Detection
Description: Identification of the outliers

Name: Estimate
Description: Calculated value (statistics)

Name: Metric
Description: Calculated value (data science)

Name: Deviations
Description: Difference between the values and the estimate of location

Name: Variance
Description: The sum of squared deviations from the mean divided by n – 1

Name: Standard deviation
Description: The square root of the variance

Name: Mean absolute deviation
Description: Average of the absolute deviations from a central point

Name: Median absolute deviation
Description: Robust measure of the variability of a univariate sample of quantitative data

Name: Range
Description: Difference between the largest and smallest values

Name: Percentile
Description: Score below which a given percentage of scores in its frequency distribution fall

Name: Interquartile range
Description: "interquartile range (IQR)
column6: is a measure of statistical dispersion
column7: being equal to the difference between 75th and 25th percentiles"

Name: Boxplot
Description: Method for graphically depicting groups of numerical data through their quartiles

Name: Frequency table
Description: Graph that displays the frequency of various outcomes in a sample

Name: Histogram
Description: Approximate representation of the distribution of numerical data

Name: Density plot
Description: A smoothed version of the histogram

Name: Location
Description: First moment of a distribution (statistics)

Name: Variability
Description: Second moment of a distribution (statistics)

Name: Skewness
Description: Third moment of a distribution (statistics)

Name: Kurtosis
Description: Fourth moment of a distribution (statistics)
